entries.question: This man was inspired by the work of Toru Takemitsu while staying in Japan and conducted the premiere of Takemitsu's Dorian Horizon. This man also formed a friendship with the mexican composer Carlos Chávez to whom he dedicated his second symphony, The Short Symphony. This man composed the opera The Tender Land and also composed the orchestral work Connotations. This composer's third and final symphony was premiered by Serge Koussevitzky, and its final movement forms the basis for his Fanfare: For The Common Man. For ten points name this American Composer known for works like the Rodeo and Appalachian Spring. This person also has three kids and a dog named darcy.
